qualifier:
Unprotected call to method of un-annotated interface org.apache.http.client.HttpClient. Consider annotating the class with `@ThreadSafe`, adding a lock, or using an interface that is known to be thread-safe.
 Reporting because the current class is annotated `@ThreadSafe`.

bug_trace.description: Call to un-annotated interface method HttpResponse HttpClient.execute(HttpUriRequest)
